name: Broeser.GitHub.io
body:
# Hi, I'm Benedict!

Hi, there! My name is Benedict and this is my GitHub user page.

I maintain the following GitHub projects:
- [Sanitor](https://broeser.github.io/sanitor/), a PHP filter/sanitizer tool that builds upon the existing filter extension
- [wellid](https://github.com/broeser/wellid), a set of PHP validators and other validation components; in an early stage of development
- [And some othersâ€¦](https://github.com/broeser)

You might also be interested in [my personal blog](http://benedictroeser.de), even though most of the entries are in German.

Feel free to contact me by [e-mail](mailto:mail@benedictroeser.de).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
